full_summary:
### Service Catalogue and Foundational Elements - Organizational Design and Classification Consultants (One Senior and One Intermediate)


#### Summary

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit a proposal for the provision of Organizational Design and Classification Consultants (one Senior and one Intermediate) to support the establishment and deployment of TARBI's Service Catalogue.


#### Key Details

* **Tender Number**: 1000440997
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-18
* **Tender Closes**: 2023-05-16T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start**: None
* **Expected Contract End**: None
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Method of Supply**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Canada Revenue Agency, 320 Queen Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L5, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Furqana Mehkari, [Furqana.Mehkari@cra-arc.gc.ca](mailto:Furqana.Mehkari@cra-arc.gc.ca), (613) 219-6096


#### Description of the Requirement

The CRA requires the services of two Organizational design and classification consultants (one at Senior level and one at Intermediate level) to support the establishment and deployment of TARBI's Service Catalogue. The proposed period of the contract will be from the date of Contract Award to November 30, 2023, plus one additional six-month option period. The estimated level of effort of the contract is 75 (days) in total for two consultants.

This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under "Tier 1" ($0 - $3.75M) for the categories: 1.2 Organizational Design and Classification Consultants (1 Senior and 1 Intermediate) under Stream 1 - Human Resources Services Stream.

Applicable Trade Agreements:

* Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)
* Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
